price: Na wanapo ona Ishara, wanafanya maskhara.
footnotes: Na wanapo ona ushahidi wa kuonyesha uweza wa Mwenyezi Mungu huitana wapate kupita mipaka katika kumkejeli.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
